.. _`design_system_components_objectactivities`:

ObjectActivities
================

.. figure:: images/component_objectactivities.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

The activity stream of an object as a list of postings. Postings display author thumbnail
and posted text, including thumbnails of attached media and links to attached objects.
Also provides controls for commenting and adding posts.


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_postinglist`
